Package org.javautil.commandline

This is all about parsing commandlines directly or from services.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CommandLineErrorHandler  
 

Class Summary
BaseArgumentBean  
CommandLineHandler A class that facilitates the declarative definition of program arguments using java annotations.
CommandLineParser  
DefaultCommandLineErrorHandler  
ParameterCreator  
ParameterFormatter  
 

Enum Summary
ParamType Describes the content type associated with a command line parameter.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidArgumentException This class is used to differentiate a user supplied invalid argument from a program error.
InvalidCommandLineArgumentException Thrown when a command line argument is invalid.
 

Package org.javautil.commandline Description

This is all about parsing commandlines directly or from services.
